data.text:
Crime is down and our communities are safer with President Trump in office.

Democrats can protest all they want but the truth is law and order saves lives. https://t.co/VmzBi3tvz8

Our nation is at an inflection point--it's time to decide whether you stand for law & order or for chaos.

I intro'd the Protect America Act to end sanctuary cities, protect law enforcement officers, enhance penalties for illegal entry, & defund rogue NGOs.

We cannot back down.

The people attacking ICE aren’t motivated by “empathy” or “compassion.”

They protest and riot for violent foreign criminals but are silent when America’s sons and daughters are murdered by illegal aliens.

They don’t care about justice. They care about power. https://t.co/Xocu0s5dEH

Calling everyone you don't agree with "racist" doesn't work anymore.

We're going to accelerate mass deportations.

We're going to denaturalize AND deport Somali fraudsters.

And George Soros, the Rockefeller Foundation, and the Carnegie Corporation can't stop what's coming.

The term "Law & Order."

On July 10, 2020, Public Citizen tweeted that “law and order” is a “racist dog whistle.” https://t.co/SNKkhekxsc

Not defunding the police.

On August 24, 2020, Public Citizen tweeted “Defund our racist, hyper-militarized, murderous American police force.” https://t.co/9AYjr694iL

Checking citizenship on the census.

On January 15, 2019, Public Citizen tweeted that asking about citizenship status on the census was “racist.” https://t.co/sz26TRZpjQ

Not making DC a State.

On June 25, 2020, Public Citizen tweeted “Racism is the reason DC is not a state. https://t.co/zUuwbxESVh

Law Enforcement writ large.

On April 15, 2021, Public Citizen tweeted that “law enforcement in this country” had been infested by “racism.” https://t.co/6GxiRKyVw1
